Hablaremos de Juana M. ,  quien es la Directora del Comité, ella  es casada, vive en su propia casa , con su marido.  S e dedica a la venta de Ropas ,   para mujeres, hombres y niños.
Juana , es muy trabajadora y hogareña . 
Su negocio lo tiene en su casa en un pequeño salón donde expone sus mercaderias para los clientes.
Ella desea ampliar su negocio comprando más variedades de ropas ya que se acerca esta entrando la primaV. y el resto del crédito lo utilizará para terminar su casa.
texts.en:
The committee was formed in the neighborhood of Villa Bonita in the city of Villa Elisa. The committee currently consists of 15 members, all residents of the neighborhood. We'll focus on Juana M., who is the director of the committee. She's married and lives in her own home with her husband. She sells clothing for women, men, and children. Juana is very hardworking and she loves her home. She runs her business out of her house from a small sitting room where she displays her merchandise for her clients. She wants to expand her business by buying more varieties of clothing because spring is around the corner and she will use the rest of the loan to finish her house.

Translated from Spanish by Kate Richardson, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of clothing to sell and construction materials

loans.name: Darling Yanet

texts.es: La señora Darling Yanet es una mujer muy trabajadora, ella tiene un negocio de pulpería,  por lo que tiene más de 6 años que se dedica a este negocio. El inicio debido a la necesidad de proporcionarle a su familia los ingresos necesarios. Ella tiene 3 hijos menores a su cargo, que con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado proporcionarles estudios, alimentos y vestimenta. El financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de golosinas, refrescos, jugos, pan, detergentes y granos básicos. Desea ampliar su inventario aun más para ofrecerles a sus clientes una variedad de productos.
texts.en:
Darling Yanet is a hard working woman. She owns a general store and has been in this line of business for over 6 years. She started it so as to provide her family with the income they need. She has 3 young children under her charge, and with great effort she has managed to provide them with schooling, food and clothing. She is requesting a loan to buy sweets, soft drinks, juices, bread, detergents and staple grains. She wants to increase her stock in order to be able to offer her customers with a larger assortment of goods.

Translated from Spanish by Alba Sort , Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Rosa Claudina

texts.es:
Rosa de 53 años, confecciona y cose ropa, es madres soltera y vive en una zona urbana llamada Guasmo, caracterizada por la cantidad de habitantes informales comerciantes. 

Por la falta de oportunidades ella empezó cociendo a mano las ropas, después pudo comprar con esfuerzo una maquina de cocer. Desde ese tiempo hasta ahora ella trabaja en su casa con su taller de confección de ropa. Trabaja desde las 08h00am hasta las 22h30pm. 

Para seguir produciendo y confeccionando ropa ella quiere comprar con el préstamo telas, hilos y botones. En el futuro quiere tener un taller de costura mas grande.
texts.en:
Rosa, 53, makes and sews clothes. She is a single mother and lives in an urban area called Guasmo, where many of the inhabitants work in informal trading. Due to a lack of opportunities she began by sewing clothes by hand. Later, with effort, she was able to buy a sewing machine. Since then she has been running her own sewing workshop from home. She works from 8am to 10.30pm. In order to continue making clothes she intends to use the loan to buy fabric, thread and buttons. In future she would like to own a larger sewing workshop.

Translated from Spanish by Alba Sort , Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Fabric, buttons, thread.

loans.name: Dionicia

texts.es: La Sra. Dionicia  es cliente de nuestra institución 12 años se dedica a la venta de comida en el mercado de la Zona donde vive, la Sra. Dionicia es la única vendedora de comida del mencionado  mercado, ocupa como tres puestos de venta tiene una muy buena venta  razón por la cual atiende con la ayuda de una de sus hijas, descanso 4 años y retorna ahora nuevamente, su esposo es chofer asalariado y por las noches trabaja  como portero del mismo  mercado, la Sra. Dionicia necesita proveerse de abarrotes por quintales por el incremento de los mismos y una parte utilizara para la construcción de su vivienda, razón por la cual  solicita este financiamiento kiva.
texts.en:
Ms. Dionicia has been a client of Emprender for 12 years. She sells food in the market near where she lives. Ms. Dionicia is the only food vendor in the aforementioned market. She occupies three stands and makes very good sales, so her daughters help her tend the business. She took a break for four years and now she is returning again. Her husband is a salaried driver and at night he works as a doorman at the same market. Ms. Dionicia is requesting this Kiva loan because she needs to buy groceries in bulk to increase her sales. She will also use part of the loan for construction on her house.

Translated from Spanish by Katie Kavanagh, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to buy groceries in bulk, and to buy doors for construction on her house

loans.name: Josselin

texts.es: Josselin, de 19 años, es soltera y vive en  la casa de sus padres, en compañía de ellos y de sus hermanos menores, juntos trabajan para salir adelante y alcanzar el progreso. La vida de esta trabajadora joven no ha sido fácil, pues empezó a ayudar a sus padres desde muy pequeña. Hoy trabaja como vendedora de productos de belleza; y la modalidad de su trabajo es la siguiente: ofrece los productos del catalogo a sus amigos y vecinos, luego de un tiempo entrega el pedido dejando a crédito el producto. En tanto, no se conforma con los clientes vigente que tiene, es por ello que camina largos trechos en busca de nuevos compradores. Le gusta mucho su trabajo porque es tranquilo y no descuida las labores de su hogar, y con las ganancias que obtiene puede ayudar a sus padres, además esta ahorrando para empezar a estudiar una carrera técnica. Como es una joven muy emprendedora, tiene planeado continuar en la venta de productos de belleza, además quiere instalar un pequeño bazar dentro de su casa, pues por la zona donde vive no hay ninguno. Es el primer crédito que tiene con MFP, y promete pagar sus cuotas puntualmente ya que no quiere defraudar a las personas que hicieron posible el dinero que le permitirá continuar trabajando en busca del progreso. Josselin tiene planeado invertir el crédito que solicita en la compra de mercadería en productos de belleza pues quiere ofrecer la mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes y de esta manera espera obtener mayores ganancias.
texts.en:
Josselin, 19, is single and lives with her parents and younger siblings. They all work together seeking to attain progress. This hard working young woman’s life hasn’t been easy because she started to help her parents when still quite little. Today she works selling beauty products. This is her work methodology: she offers catalogue items to her friends and neighbors. After a short time she delivers their orders leaving the products to be paid on credit. Meanwhile, not satisfied with her active customers, she walks long distances seeking new buyers. She enjoys her work very much because it’s tranquil and she doesn’t neglect her household chores. She can use the profits to help her parents. Besides, she is saving up to pay for a technical career. Because she’s an enterprising young woman she plans to continue selling beauty products but wants to set up a small store in her home because there isn’t any in the area where she lives. This is her first loan with MFP and she promises to repay her installments on time because she does not want to disappoint the people who make the money possible that will allow her to continue working seeking progress. Josselin plans to use the requested loan to buy beauty products in order to offer her customers a wider variety of choices thus obtaining higher profits.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To acquire more cosmetics.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
Elizabeth tiene 23 años de edad, es soltera y vive junto a sus padres y hermanos en el sector Palominos del distrito de Tambogrande, una zona agricola que produce principalmente frutas como mango, limón y maracuyá, pertenece a la provincia de Piura y se encuentra ubicada en la región del mismo nombre a mas de tres horas y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Se dedica a la venta de jugos, comida, utiles escolares, golosinas y otros productos en un pequeño kiosko situado frente al colegio de su localidad, su negocio cuenta con mucha acogida debido a la calidad de productos que ofrece y al buen trato otorgado a sus clientes. Ella se vale de esta actividad para ayudar a sus padres con el sustento de su economia diaria.

Elizabeth desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de mas productos para ofrecerlos en venta a sus clientes, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 600 nuevos soles que le ayuden con el logro de su objetivo.

Elizabeth es una joven trabajadora y que siempre trata de velar por el bienestar de los suyos. Las personas que le conocen le consideran una persona tranquila y responsable.
texts.en:
Elizabeth is 23 years old, single, and lives with her parents and siblings in the Palominos sector of the Tambogrande district, which is an agricultural zone that primarily produces fruits like mango, lemon, and passion fruit. It is part of the Piura province, located in the region of the same name, more than three and a half hours from Chiclayo, the capital city of the Lambayeque region. She sells juices, food, school supplies, candies, and other products in a small kiosk located in front of the local high school. Her business has been very well-received because of the quality of the products she offers and how well she treats her customers. She values this work as a way to help her parents meet their daily expenses. Elizabeth wishes to expand her business with the purchase of more products to offer for sale. For this reason, she thought it best to request a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for the first time. She is requesting 600 nuevos soles, which will help her to achieve her objective. Elizabeth is a hard-working young woman always tries to look out for the well-being of her own. Those who know her consider her to be a calm and responsible person.

Translated from Spanish by Katie Kavanagh, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to buy products to expand her kiosk, which is located in front of a high school

loans.name: Esther Magdalena

texts.es:
Esther Magdalena de 30 años de edad es casada, trabaja desde hace 10 años como docente de secundaria en la Escuela Paulino Halsall  de la colonia Yolaina de Nueva Guinea, tiene  una bebita de 2 añitos de edad, su esposo tambien trabaja como docente en el mismo colegio y comparten los gastos familiares y los compromisos adquiridos ya que son una familia muy unida. 

Esther  està solicitando su 5to credito para  hecharle la ceramica a su pequeña vivienda, y asi brindarle mejores condiciones a su hija. 

Doña Esther expresa sentirse muy agradecida con AFODENIC ya que por medio de los créditos obtenidos han logrado obtener su propia vivienda y han mejorado sus condiciones de vida y la de su familia, su mayor sueño en la vida es que su familia permanezcan bien unida, tener estabilidad laboral y estar bien con Dios.
texts.en:
Thirty-year-old Esther Magdelena is married and has worked for 10 years as a high school teacher in the Paulino Halsall school of the Yolaina area of Nueva Guinea. She has a darling, two-year-old baby. Her husband is also a teacher in the same school. She and her husband share family expenses and committments; they are a very close family. Esther is requesting her fifth loan to install ceramic tile in her small home and thereby give better living conditions to her daughter. Doña Esther is very grateful to AFODENIC. With previous loans, she was able to obtain her own home and improve the living conditions of her family. Her biggest dreams are that her family always remains close, has stable employment, and is on good terms with God.

Translated from Spanish by Jeff Schell, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Install ceramic floor tile

loans.name: Alba Luz

texts.es:
Doña Alba Luz de 41 años de edad labora como docente en la Esc. 14 de Septiembre en la colonia Nuevo Leòn desde hace  24 años como sub directora, tiene una niña de 10 añitos de edad la cual estudia su 5to grado de educacion primaria en la misma escuelita que su mamá trabaja, su esposo labora como agricultor en la finca de su familia y le ayuda con los gastos económicos de la unidad familiar.   

Alba Luz esta solicitando su 8vo crèdito para reparar la cocina de su vivienda y asì tener mejores condiciones, es importante mencionar que Alba Luz  se ha caracterizado por ser muy responsable con los compromisos adquiridos.

Su mayor sueño es mejorar la infraestructura de su casa, contar cob salud y trabajo para sacar a su familia adelante.
texts.en:
Forty-one-year-old Doña Alba Luz has worked as a teacher and assistant principal for 24 years in the 14th of September school in the Nuevo Leòn area. Her little girl is 10 years old and is in the fifth grade in the same school. Her husband works on his parents' farm, and he helps his wife with the expenses of their family. Alba Luz is requesting her eighth loan to repair the kitchen of her home and thereby have better living conditions. It is important to mention that Alba Luz has been very responsible in honoring committments that she has made. Her biggest dreams are to improve the infrastructure of her house, have good health, and work to assure that her family moves forward and is successful.

Translated from Spanish by Jeff Schell, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Repair of the kitchen

loans.name: Diana

texts.es:
La Sra. Diana Vive en la ciudad  la Paz, en la zona de alto San Pedro, la casa donde vive es familiar herencia de los suegros, la cliente es casada con el señor Frid. Doña diana se dedica a la venta de comida en el mismo domicilio lleva 1 año con esta actividad además de realizar la venta a crédito de una variedad de productos según pedido. El crédito será destinado para la compra de edredones y artefactos electrónicos mismos que serán distribuidos en el departamento de santa cruz, es una persona muy trabajadora y esta  muy agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.

En la foto la Sra. Diana Aparece acompañada de su Mama.
texts.en:
Diana lives in the city of la Paz, high up in the area of San Pedro. The house where she lives is the family home of her in-laws, the client is married to Frid. Diana has been selling food at the same address for 1 year, and in addition she sells a variety of products on credit according to order. The loan will be used to buy duvets and electronic devices which will be distributed in the Santa Cruz department. She is a very hard working person and is very grateful to the institution for the support provided. In the photo Diana is accompanied by her mother.

Translated from Spanish by Catherine Dent, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: PURCHASE DUVETS AND ELECTRONIC DEVICES

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es:
qLa profesora Rosa Marìa de 35 años de edad trabaja en la Escuela Salomòn Ibarra Mayorga desde hace 9 años en la colonia Los Angeles a 5 km de Nueva Guinea, tiene de 2 hijos el mayor de 7 añitos de edad y un bebito de 6 meses de nacido, su esposo trabaja tambien como docente y ambos comparten con los gastos familiares del hogar. 

stà solicitando su 3er crèdito a la instituciòn con el objetivo de construir una habitaciòn con mejores condiciones y asì tener privacidad en el hogar ya que su familia esta creciendo y necesitan mas espacio para desarrollarse mejor, su sueño en la vida es sobre todo es que su familia tenga salud,estabilidad laboral y que sus hijos estudien.
texts.en:
Rosa María is a 35 year-old teacher who has worked for nine years at the Salomón Ibarra Mayorga School in the Los Angeles settlement, five kilometers from Nueva Guinea. She has two children. The older is seven years old and the baby was born six months ago. Her husband also works as a teacher and they both share the family's household expenses. She is requesting her third loan from AFODENIC with the goal of building a room with better conditions, in order to have privacy in their home. Their family is growing and they need more space to develop well. Her dream in life is, above all, that her family have good health, stable jobs, and that her children go to school.

Translated from Spanish by Katie Kavanagh, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to add a room to her house, for her growing family

loans.name: Jose De Los Reyes

texts.es:
Don Jose de los Reyes de 62 años de edad es casado,vive en la zona # 4 de Nueva Guinea desde hace 30 años junto a su familia compuesta por sus 2 hijos mayores de edad y su esposa, la cual labora como conserje de una financiera, ambos son bien trabajadores y bien responsables con sus compromisos adquiridos. Don Jose  trabaja para el MARENA desde hace 11 años como guardabosque de las areas protegidas del municipio.

Està solicitando su 6to crèdito para invertirlo en mejoras de su vivienda como es arreglar una pared en cocina y pagar la mano de obra de la misma, su mayor sueño es poder mejorar su vivienda para brindarle mejores condiciones de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
José de los Reyes, 62, is married and has lived in Nueva Guinea’s Zona #4 neighborhood for 30 years with his family which is composed of his wife and two adult children. His wife works as a caretaker at a financial institution. Both are hard workers and quite responsible with acquired commitments. José has worked for MARENA (Ministry of Environment and Natural Resources) for 11 years as a forest ranger in protected areas of the municipality. He is asking for his 6th loan to invest in home improvements. He wants to repair a kitchen wall and pay labor costs for the project. His greatest wish is to provide better living conditions for his family.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To repair a kitchen wall.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: Juana, de 49 años, vive en su casa que es propia a lado de sus 3 hijos, de los cuales el mayor trabaja, mientras ella se hace cargo de los 2 menores. Juntos habitan en un barrio comercial ubicado al norte de la ciudad. Desde muy joven empezó a desempeñarse en distintas labores, pero jamás dejó de trabajar. En la actualidad se dedica a la venta de productos nutrientes de una reconocida marca a nivel mundial, que por medio de catalogo realiza el pedido de estos productos. Manifiesta que gracias a este negocio ha obtenido regulares ganancias, eso le ha permitido sacar adelante a sus hijos.  Es así que viaja de vez en cuando a provincias, logrando vender la mercadería a sus clientes. Como es una mujer emprendedora, siempre esta en busca de nuevos negocios, para el futuro tiene planeado instalar una tienda de venta de productos nutrientes y naturales, de esa manera logrará adquirir mejores ganancias. Es el tercer crédito que tiene con MFP, y promete cumplir con sus cuotas puntualmente pues no quiere decepcionar a todas las personas que hicieron posible el dinero que le permitirá continuar trabajando en busca del progreso. Juana tiene planeado invertir el crédito solicitado en la compra de cantidad de mercadería en productos nutrientes, pues quiere aprovechar las ofertas para ofrecerlos más adelante a mayores precios.
texts.en:
Juana, 49, lives in her own home with her 3 children. The oldest of her children works, while she is in charge of the 2 minor children. They live together in a commercial neighborhood located in the northern part of the city. Since the time she was very young, she has held a variety of jobs, but she never stopped working. Now she is selling nutritional products from a brand that is well-known throughout the world through a catalog, taking orders from her customers. She states that thanks to this business she has been able to have regular earnings, and this has allowed her to provide for her children. At times she travels to the provinces, where she manages to sell the merchandise to her customers. As she is an enterprising woman, she is always looking for new business opportunities. In the future, she plans to set up a nutritional and natural products store so that she can achieve better earnings. This is the 3rd loan that she has taken with MFP, and she promises to make her payments on time, as she does not want to disappoint all of the people who made this loan, which will allow her to continue to make progress with her business, possible. Juana plans to use the proceeds of the loan she requests to buy a large quantity of nutritional products, since she wants to take advantage of the sales so that she can sell the products later at a higher price.

Translated from Spanish by Lisa Grobar, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to acquire more nutritional products

loans.name: Nora Cecilia

texts.es:
Doña Nora Cecilia de 45 años de edad tiene 3 hijos, de los cuales una depende  economicamente de ella; Nora labora para INATEC desde hace 15 años desempeñandose como secretaria, ademas es una mujer con un alto espiritu de superacion, pues actualmente está culminado su carrera en la universidad.  

Esta solicitando su 8vo con el objetivo de construir una habitacion para su hija ya que ella requiere mayor privacidad y comodidad. Doña Nora se caracteriza por ser una mujer que ha luchado sola para criar a sus tres hijos, de muy buenas costumbre, honesta, trabajadora y bien querida por sus compañeros de trabajo y vecinos. 

Su mayor sueño en la vida es que  sus hijos tengan un trabajo digno y que sean personas de bien, contar con estabilidad laboral y poco a poco ir mejorando sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Mrs Nora Cecilia is 45 years old and has 3 children, all of whom depend on her financially. Nora has worked as a secretary for INATEC for the past 15 years. She is a very determined lady, who is presently finishing a degree at university. This is her 8th loan, which she will use to build a bedroom for her daughter, who needs more privacy and comfort. Nora has worked hard to bring up her 3 children well. She is honest, hardworking and held in high esteem by her work colleagues and neighbours. Her greatest dream in life is for her children to have dignified and stable careers and to be good people who, little by little, will be able to improve their lives.

Translated from Spanish by Cameron Graham, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To build a room for her daughter

loans.name: Pedro Socorro

texts.es:
Don Pedro de 40 años de edad es casado, tiene 2 niños de 15 y 12 años de edad los dos estudian, su esposa se encarga de los quehaceres del hogar.  Pedro  trabaja para el Ministerio de educacion desde hace 16 años como docente de primaria, inicio dando clases a niños campesinos de manera gratuita por medio de la iglesia catolica, posteriormente logró conseguir una plaza de docente en el MINED pagado por el gobierno ya que su vocacion es la docencia.

Està solicitando su 2do credito para reparar dos paredes de su casa que se encuentran en mal estado de  su  casa ya que se encuentran en mal estado, su mayor sueño en la vida  es tener estabilidad laboral, que sus hijos estudien y sean hombres de bien y  mejorar sus condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Pedro, 40, is married and has two sons who are 15 and 12 years of age; both are students. His wife is a housewife. Pedro has worked for the Ministry of Education as an elementary school teacher for 16 years. He started out teaching rural children for free through the Catholic Church. Later on he was able to secure a paid teaching position with the Ministry of Education since his vocation is teaching. He is asking for his second loan to repair two walls in his house that are in poor condition. His greatest wish in life is to have employment stability, that his children study and become upstanding citizens and to improve his family’s living conditions.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: For wall repair.

loans.name: Maria Venancia

texts.es: Maria Venancia tiene 31 años, su actividad es una pulpería. Hace más de 10 años que tiene este negocio. Tiene 1 hijo a su cargo, pues busca la forma de mejorar sus ingresos, el negocio fue iniciativa propia. Pues siempre busca la forma de mejorar sus ingresos cada día, por lo que ha sido muy gratificante para ella y su familia. Este financiamiento es para la compra de materia prima como golosinas, refrescos, pan, galletas, jugos, detergentes y granos básicos. Sueña con realizar su pequeña pulpería en una distribuidora.
texts.en:
Maria Venancia is 31 years old. She has had a general store for more than 10 years. She has one child. Every day, she works to improve her income, which is very satisfying to her and her family. This loan will be used to buy basic goods, such as sweets, soft drinks, bread, biscuits, juice, detergent and grains. Her goal is to turn her general store into a distributor.

Translated from Spanish by Ross Forman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: David Antonio

texts.es:
David de 34 años, es soldado de metales y  vive en una zona urbana llamada Guasmo, caracterizada por la cantidad de habitantes comerciantes. 

Empezó hace 13 años como soldador de puertas y ventanas, poco a poco aprendió de la profesión y se dedico a aprender y a trabajar para poder mantener a su familia. Ahora el tiene su taller de soldaduras y metales en un garaje. Trabaja desde las 07h30am hasta las 18h00pm todos los días.   

Con el préstamo quiere comprar metales y soldaduras para su taller. En el futuro quiere tener un taller mas grande y así ayudar a sus hermanos económicamente dándoles trabajo.
texts.en:
David is 34 years old. He is a metal solderer, and he lives in an urban area called Guasmo, which has a large number of traders. He began soldering 13 years again with doors and windows. Over time, he learned the trade and began to work to support his family. Now he has a metal and soldering workshop based in a garage. He works from 7:30 am to 6 pm every day. This loan will be used to buy metal and solder for his workshop. In the future, he would like to have a larger workshop and thereby help his brothers by giving them work.

Translated from Spanish by Ross Forman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy solder and metal

loans.name: Mario

texts.es: El Señor Mario nacido en Santa Cruz, casado con doña Luisa tiene 3 hijos que se encuentran en edad escolar. El señor desde su niñez vive en Pampa el Cosal provincia cordillera, el trabaja en la  agricultura,  siembra sandia, yuca, papa, etc. y también tiene su camión que cuando no siembra lo trabaja con pasajero al Torno, pero mas se dedica con negocio propio ya que el auto le sirve para transportar sus productos al mercado de el Torno. El dinero del crédito lo utilizara para contratar mano de obra para la preparación de la tierra y así poder sembrar sus productos, esta muy agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Mario was born in Santa Cruz. He is married to Luisa and has three school-age children. From childhood, he has lived in the mountain region of Pampa el Cosal. He works in agriculture, cultivating watermelons, yucca, potatoes, and so on. He also has a truck, so when he's not working on the farm, he takes passengers to the market town of El Torno. However, the more he dedicates himself to his own farm, the more he uses his vehicle to transport his goods to El Torno. He will use this loan to hire farm hands to help with preparing the land so he can plant more products. He thanks microfinace partner Emprender for supporting him.

Translated from Spanish by Ross Forman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To hire farm laborers for the cultivation of watermelons

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es:
Luis Alberto de 44 años de edad es casado,  tiene 2 hijos los cuales estudian, su esposa  se encarga de los quehaceres de hogar y del cuido de sus hijos. labora como docente de educaciòn profesional desde hace 14 años en el CETA INATEC de Nueva Guinea ubicado en la colonia Yolaina. 

Esta solicitando su 9no credito con el cual pretende construir una habitaciòn con mejores condiciones como todo cuidadano lo sueña, don Luis se siente agradecido por los creditos que ha obtenido por la institucion ya que ha mejorado sus condiciones de vida en su hogar, su mayor sueño es poco a poco mejorando su vivienda y tener estabilidad laboral para cumplir con sueño.
texts.en:
Luis Alberto, 44, is married and has two children who are students. His wife is a housewife and cares for the children. He has worked as a teacher for 14 years at the National Technical Institute in Nueva Guinea located in the Yolaina neighborhood. He is asking for his 9th loan which he intends to use to build a room with the best conditions like every citizen dreams of. Luis is grateful for the loans that he has gotten through the Institution that have improved the living conditions of his home. His greatest wish is to gradually improve his home and have employment stability to reach his dream.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To build a room.

loans.name: Luis

texts.es: Luis, de 46 años, vive en su casa que es propia en compañía de su esposa Tania de 36 años y de sus 3 hijos menores que estudian en el colegio, juntos se esfuerzan por salir adelante cada día. Desde hace 14 años, este trabajador hombre se dedica a brindar el servicio de transporte en una combi (movilidad que transporta a 12 personas). Dice que le gusta mucho su trabajo pues obtiene regulares ganancias, además se entretiene mucho pues mientras se moviliza observa las calles y se distrae. Aunque muchas veces siente el cansancio del tráfico de la ciudad, pero sabe que todo sacrificio tiene su recompensa, en este caso, son las ganancias diarias que obtiene luego de jornada larga de trabajo. Así transcurren los días de este hombre que tiene muchos planes en mente, como el de comprar varias movilidades para emprender su empresa de transporte, por eso se esfuerza cada día hasta conseguirlo. Es el primer crédito que tiene con MFP y promete pagar con puntualidad sus cuotas, porque no quiere defraudar a todas las personas que hicieron posible el dinero que le permitirá salir adelante en su negocio. Luis tiene planeado invertir el crédito que solicita, en la compra de nuevas llantas pues las que tiene están algo deterioradas; asimismo podrá darle un mantenimiento técnico.
texts.en:
Luis, 46, lives in his own home with his wife, Tania, 36, and their three minor children who are in school. Together they make an effort to get ahead in life daily. For the last 14 years this hard working man has provided public transportation services in a combi (a 12-passenger vehicle). He says that he enjoys his work very much because he earns regular income. Besides, he amuses himself quite a bit as he travels along the streets observing. Although the city traffic often exhausts him he knows that every sacrifice has its reward. In this case it’s daily profits he gets after a long day of work. Thus the days pass for this man who has many plans in mind, like buying several vehicles to launch a transportation firm. He therefore makes a daily effort to reach this goal. This is his first loan with MFP and he promises to repay on time because he doesn’t want to disappoint all those who made the money possible that will permit him to succeed with his business. Luis plans to use the requested funds to buy new tires because the ones he has are pretty deteriorated. He also plans to provide technical maintenance to the vehicle.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy tires and provide technical maintenance to his vehicle.

loans.name: Maria De Lourde

texts.es:
María de 53 años, confecciona y cose ropa, es madres soltera y vive en una zona urbana llamada Guasmo, caracterizada por la cantidad de habitantes comerciantes. 

Hace 10 años comenzó con su taller de costura y confección readecuando una parte de la casa para poder tener su negocio. Todo el día cose y confecciona no tiene horario fijo porque trabaja en su casa, uno de los inconvenientes que tiene para hacer su trabajo es que uno de sus hijos esta enfermo y debe dedicarle mucho tiempo ya que esta divorciada. 

Para tener mas oportunidades de confeccionar ropa a sus clientes ella quiere comprar con el préstamo una maquina de coser y telas para su taller de costura. En el futuro quiere tener su taller fuera de su casa para tener mas espacio y gente que le ayude.
texts.en:
María is 53 years old. She is a single mother, and she lives in the urban area called Guasmo, which has a large number of businesses. She designs and sews clothes. She started her sewing workshop 10 years ago, refitting part of her home to house the business. She sews and designs every day, but has no fixed timetable since she works from home. One problem she has with her work is that one of her sons is ill, and because she is divorced, she has to spend a lot of time taking care of him. In order to be able to make more clothes for her clients, she wants to use this loan to buy a sewing machine and fabrics. In the future, she would like to have a workshop based outside of her home so that she could have more space and hire people to help her.

Translated from Spanish by Ross Forman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy a sewing machine and fabric

loans.name: Juana Aristina

texts.es: Juana Aristina tiene 22 años, su actividad económica es  una pulpería. Por lo que todos los días se levanta temprano desde la 8 de la mañana hasta las  9 de la noche por lo que sus clientes llegan a comprar los productos que ofrece  Tiene más de 3 años que se dedica a este negocio ella comenzó a comprar muy pocos productos, pero eran lo que sus clientes le solicitaban de primera necesidad. Poco a poco surtió su pequeña tienda y la estableció en su vivienda. El financiamiento lo va utilizar para comprar arroz, bebidas, azúcar, aceite, golosinas, detergentes y jugos. Ella sueña con mejorar sus ingresos y además proporcionarle mejoras a su vivienda.
texts.en:
Juana Aristina is 22-years-old. She runs a general store. Everyday she gets up early and works from 8 a.m. to 9 p.m. so that her customers can buy her products. She's had this business for more than 3 years. She began with only a few products, but they were the most essential for her customers. Little by little she stocked up her small store and established her home. She will use this loan to buy rice, drinks, sugar, oil, candy, detergent, and juice. She dreams of increasing her income and improving her home.

Translated from Spanish by Kate Richardson, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Mirian Irma

texts.es: La Sra. Mirian, vive en la Localidad de el Torno Barrio Naciones Unidas, tiene  3 hijos que se encuentran en edad escolar es  casada con el señor Juan hace 20 años, su Actividad es la venta de comida hace 2 años en un colegio tecnológico y como segunda actividad trabaja como profesora en el colegio cerca a su casa  y su esposo también trabaja como director de un  colegio en la  localidad limoncito, oriunda de Potosí sud chichas vive en el torno hace 25 años, el  destino del crédito es para la compra de abarrotes como ser aceite, papa, arroz, etc. y también refrescos  y aumentar capital de trabajo, al mismo tiempo se siente muy agradecida con emprender por haberle brindado este apoyo dándole el crédito cuando mas lo necesitaba.
texts.en:
Mrian lives in the Naciones Unidos neighborhood of El Torno. She has three school age children. She has been married to Juan for 20 years. She has been selling food at a technological school for 20 years. As a second activity she works as a teacher at a school close to her house. Her husband works as a principal of a school in Limoncito. She is a native of Potosí Sud Chichas, and she has lived in El Torno for 25 years. The loan is to buy groceries like oil, potatoes, and rice, etc. She will also buy soft drinks and increase her working capital. She is very grateful to Emprender for having given her this support and giving her the loan when she needed it the most.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy soft drinks and groceries

loans.name: Amistad Eterna Group

texts.es:
La asociación comunal “Amistad Eterna” están organizándose para iniciar el ciclo número tres. El grupo está compuesto por diez mujeres, de este grupo se ha elejido la mesa directiva: presidenta, tesorera y secretaria de actas. 

La señora Juana, con tres ciclos en la asociación es la presidenta de la asociación.  Actualmente su negocio es la venta de verduras y fue iniciado por iniciativa propia.

Sus créditos le sirvieron para la compra de mercadería, la misma que es comprada de los mayoristas en la Ceja de El Alto y vendida por menor en diferentes ferias de la ciudad de El Alto.
Una de sus hijas le ayuda en la venta de verduras.

A la pregunta de qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, la señora Juana responde la "capacitación".
Las otras integrantes de la asociación también tienen sus propios negocios: venta de artículos varios, venta de chuño (papa deshidratada) y papas, venta de refrescos, agencia de pollo, venta de abarrotes, venta de lotería, venta de vegetales, venta de productos de limpieza y aseo, venta de pensión y otros.
texts.en:
The "Amistad Eterna" (Eternal Friendship) Communal Bank is preparing to start their third cycle. The group is comprised of ten women. The group has elected its governing board; the president, treasurer, and secretary. Juana, the president, has been with the bank for three cycles. Her current business is selling vegetables. She started on her own initiative. Her loans have served to buy merchandise, which she buys from wholesalers in the outskirts of El Alto. She sells the merchandise for retail prices in different fairs in the city of El Alto. One of her daughter helps her sell vegetables. When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, Juana said "the training". The other members of the communal bank also have their own businesses, which are selling various things, selling "chuño" (dehydrated potatoes), selling potatoes, selling soft drinks, a chicken business, selling cleaning products, selling groceries, selling lottery tickets, selling room and board services, and other activities.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy vegetables

loans.name: Felipa

texts.es:
La Sra.  Felipa  oriunda de  Piraimiri Vallegrande Santa Cruz. Actualmente vive en la localidad del torno, Barrio Bolivia  hace 30 años, y cuenta con 2 hijos que se encuentran en edad escolar.
Estado civil: concubina hace 30 años, con el señor Ángel que se dedica a al actividad de agricultura en la zona de 3 posas San Lui. 
Actividad: venta de carne en la localidad el Torno, hace 6 años en el sector de pollos. El destino del crédito: para la compra de lechones, para las fiestas festivas para engordarlos. y el resto para aumentar capital de trabajo, doña Felipa se encuentra muy agradecida con la institución por haberle brindado el apoyo para poder crecer con su negocio y al mismo tiempo hacerla sentir mejor persona .
texts.en:
Miss Felipa is from Piraimiri Vallegrande Santa Cruz. She has lived in El Torno, Bolivia Neighbourhood, for 30 years. She has 2 school-aged children. Marital status: she has lived with Mr Ángel for 30 years. He farms in the 3 Posas San Lui zone. Business: Meat sales in the El Torno town. She has worked in the chicken sector for 6 years. The use of the loan: for the purchase of suckling pugs for festive holidays to fatten them up. The rest of the loan is to increase working capital. Felipa is very grateful to the Institucion for offering her the support to grow with her business and at the same time making her feel like a better person.

Translated from Spanish by Christine Cooper, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: the purchase of suckling pigs

loans.name: Leidy Soledad

texts.es:
Leidy tiene 20 años, es soltera y reside junto a sus padres en el distrito de Tambogrande, una zona cuya economía gira principalmente en torno al cultivo de frutas, las cuales se exportan a diversos países del exterior. Pertene a la provincia de Piura y se encuentra ubicada en la region del mismo nombre, a mas de tres horas y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Ella es una joven emprendedora y que desea valerse de si misma para solventar sus gastos y apoyar a su familia, por ello decidió iniciar un negocio de venta de bebidas en su domicilio, ella cuenta con un stock fijo de cervezas y bebidas gaseosas que ofrece a sus clientes durante todo el dia. Debido al buen trato que brinda a sus clientes su negocio cuenta con muy buena acogida.

Los ingresos que percibe de esta actividad los utiliza solventando sus gastos personales y ayudando a su familia en el sostenimiento de la economía diaria. Actualmente desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de mas bebidas de modo que pueda ampliar sus ventas. Para lograr esta acción ha creído conveniene solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1200 nuevos soles.

Leidy es una mujer tranquila y responsable, su mas grande anhelo es seguir creciendo como empresaria hasta llegar a convertirse en distribuidora. Las personas que le conocen la consideran una muchacha alegre y activa.
texts.en:
Leidy is 20 years old. She is single and lives with her parents in the Tambogrande district, an area whose economy revolves mostly around fruit growing. These are exported to various foreign countries. It belongs to the province of Piura and it is located in the region of the same name, more than three hours from the city of Chiclayo, capital Lambayeque region. She is an enterprising young woman who wants to make something of herself in order to pay expenses and support her family. That is why she decided to start a business selling beverages from her home. She has a fixed stock of beer and soft drinks that she offers her customers all day. Due to the good service that she offers her customers, her business is very popular. She uses the income that she receives from this activity to pay for her personal expenses and to help her family with its daily budget. At present, she wishes to enlarge her business by buying more beverages so that she can increase her sales. To achive this, she had decided that it is in her interest to ask Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1200 nuevos soles. Leidy is a calm and responsible woman. Her greatest wish is to keep growing as a business woman until she can become a distributor. The people who know her consider her to be a cheerful and active girl.

Translated from Spanish by Ellen Donohue, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase beer and soft drinks to enlarge her business selling from her house.

loans.name: Pascuala

texts.es: Pascuala, de 43 años, vive en su casa que es propia en compañía de su esposo Félix de 48 años, y de sus 4 hijos, de los cuales 3 son menores, mientras que el mayor trabaja y se mantiene. El día empieza muy temprano y para ella el tiempo pasa rápido, ya que debe preparar sus postres y bocaditos, que son vendidos en las afueras de un centro educativo o deportivos cercanas a su casa. Desde hace 6 meses, empezó en el negocio y le va muy bien, ya que el gran sabor que tiene sus postres es del gusto de todos sus habituales clientes, además por los cómodos precios que tiene es accesible al bolsillo de todos. El vender de manera ambulante significaba caminar largas horas hasta acabar con toda lo que había preparado durante el día. Esta actividad le ha permitido obtener las ganancias que le permiten ayudar a su esposo en los constantes gastos del hogar. Su mayor anhelo es instalar una tienda de venta de dulces y postres, pues desea trabajar de manera estable. Es el primer crédito que tiene con MFP y promete pagar puntualmente sus cuotas, pues quiere continuar trabajando para salir adelante, adema esta muy agradecida con todas las personas que hicieron posible el dinero que ayuda a personas trabajadoras a continuar en sus actividades productivas. Pascuala tiene planeado invertir el crédito solicitado en la compra de ingredientes al por mayor que necesita para continuar ofreciendo la mejor variedad de dulces y postres  a sus clientes, de esta manera  espera aumentar sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Pascuala, 43, lives in her own house with her husband, Félix, 48, and their four children, three of whom are minors; the oldest works and supports himself. Her day starts very early and time passes quickly because she must prepare her desserts and snacks that she takes to sell outside a local school or sports venue near her home. She started the business 6 months ago and does quite well because her desserts are quite tasty and liked by her regular customers. Besides, the good prices make them accessible to every pocket. Selling in an ambulatory manner means walking long distances until everything prepared that day is sold. This activity has allowed her to earn extra income that has helped her husband meet constant household expenses. Her greatest wish is to set up a store to sell sweets and desserts because she wants to work in a more stable way. This is her first loan with MFP and she promises to repay on time because she wants to continue working to get ahead. She is also very grateful to all the people that made the money possible that helps working people to continue being productive. Pascuala plans to use the requested funds to buy ingredients at wholesale that she needs to continue offering the best variety of sweets and desserts to her customers thereby increasing her profits.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy ingredients to prepare more desserts and snacks.

loans.name: Felicia Lia

texts.es: La Sra. Felicia, vive en la zona de Alto  Obrajes es casada  tiene dos hijos es muy trabajadora ella realiza el preparado de empanadas y papas fritas,  a las cuatro de la madrugada ya que a las siete de la mañana reparte las empanadas y las papas fritas en los distintos colegios de la zona todos los días, los días sábados y domingos reparte a kioscos y tiendas de barrio , la Sra. Felicia destinara su préstamo para mejorar su ambiente de trabajo y aumentar un horno que le facilitara su trabajo diario, esta muy agradecida con la institucion por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Felicia livesin the Alto Obrajes area. She is married and has two children. She is very hardworking. Every day she prepares empanadas and french fries at four in the morning and at seven in the morning she delivers the empanadas and french fries to different schools in the area. On Saturdays and Sundays she delivers to kiosks and neighborhood stores. Felicia will use her loan to improve the ambience of her work and to enlarge an oven that will ease her daily work. She is very grateful to the institution for the support it has offered.

Translated from Spanish by Ellen Donohue, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy equipment for the preparation of her products.

loans.name: Teofilo

texts.es: Teofilo, de 37 años, vive en su casa que es propia en compañía de su esposa Janeth de 30 años, y sus 2 pequeños hijos menores que estudian en el colegio, juntos y con muchas ganas de salir adelante habitan en un populoso barrio ubicado al norte de la ciudad. Cada día es una lucha constante para salir adelante en la vida de este trabajador hombre. Y desde hace 2 años, se dedica a brindar el servicio de taxi, y afirma que le gusta mucho su labor pues el tiempo le ha permitido adquirir clientes fijos que lo llaman cuando necesitan que los movilice, esto le permite obtener buenas ganancias seguras. Trabaja por las calles de la ciudad de día, pues el horario nocturno no le agrada mucho,  ya que es algo peligroso, y como el auto es propio no tiene inconvenientes para establecer sus horarios y su ruta. Además paralelamente a esta labor, también tiene una tienda de venta de discos en un gran emporio comercial de la ciudad, y con la ayuda de un empleado atiende el negocio, pues le genera regulares ganancias. Así transcurren los días de este hombre, siempre en busca del bienestar de su familia, y como siempre piensa en el futuro, tiene planeado ampliar su tienda de venta de discos y adquirir un puesto propio, pues el actual  es alquilado. Es el primer crédito que tiene con MFP, y promete cumplir puntualmente con sus cuotas ya que no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible este préstamo que le permitirá continuar trabajando en busca del progreso. Teofilo tiene planeado invertir el crédito solicitado en la compra de discos para abastecer mejor su negocio, además una parte también la destinará en brindar mantenimiento a su auto, pues en los últimas semanas ha presentado algunas averías.
texts.en:
Teofilo, age 37, lives in his own home with his wife Janeth, age 30, and their 2 small children who are in school. They live together in a densely populated neighbourhood in the north of the city, and have a great desire to get ahead. Every day is a constant fight to get ahead in life for this hard-working man. For 2 years, he has offered a taxi service. He says that he likes this work very much, and the time he has spent in this work has allowed him to acquire loyal customers who call him when they need to go somewhere. This has allowed him to have a steady income. He works in the streets of the city in the daytime, but he does not like the night schedule much, since it is dangerous. Since the car is his own, he has no problems setting his schedule and his route. Along with this job, he also has a store in a large commercial centre where he sells cds. He is helped by an employee who tends to the business, and it generates him regular income. This is how his days go by, always looking out for his family's well-being. He is always thinking of the future. He plans to expand his cd store and acquite his own location, since his current location is rented. This is his first loan with MFP, and he promises to repay his quotas punctually, since he does not want to lose face with the people who have provided the loan that will allow him to continue working in the search of progress. Teofilo plans to invest the requested loan in the purchase of cds to better stock his business. Another part will be used for maintenance for his car, since in the last few weeks it has had some breakdowns.

Translated from Spanish by Christine Cooper, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: technical maintenance for his vehicle

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es: El Sr. José Luis, vive en la Zona de Linde, es casado  tiene dos hijos pequeños,  vive en la casa de sus padres trabaja todos los días desde las  seis de la mañana a ocho de la noche y los fines de semana  hasta la madrugada ya que las personas requieren transporte después de las fiestas, el sr. José Luis destinara  su préstamo para la compra de llantas de ocasión  y mantenimiento  de su taxi, ya que esta presentando fallas y no le permite realizar un buen trabajo, esta muy agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado en la otorgación del crédito .
texts.en:
Mr. José Luis lives in the Linde Zone. He is married and has two small children. He lives in his parents' home and works every day from 6 a.m. to 8 p.m., and on weekends until dawn because people need transportation after parties. Jose Luis will use his loan for the purchase of bargain tires and for maintenance for his taxi, since it is having problems and he is not able to do a good job. He is very grateful to the Institucion for the support offered through the authorization of this loan.

Translated from Spanish by Christine Cooper, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: the purchase of tires

loans.name: Rafaela Del Socorro

texts.es: Rafaela Del Socorro tiene 56 años, ella es una mujer que no se deja abatir por las consecuencias. Ella tiene 1 hijo menor de edad, que está a su cargo. Ella se dedica a la venta de mercadería en general, todos los días sale a comprar sus productos como perfumes, cremas, tratamientos, sabanas, toallas. Ella busca la forma de mejorar sus ingresos, pues sale todos los días a recorrer las diferentes calles en donde obtiene muchos clientes que le solicitan diferentes productos. Este crédito lo solicita para la compra de materia prima necesaria para su negocio.
texts.en:
Rafaela Del Socorro, 56, is a woman who refuses to be crushed by adversity. She has a young son in her care. She sells general merchandise. Every day she goes out to buy products such as perfumes, creams, treatments, sheets and towels. She is looking at ways to boost her income, and by being out and about every day she obtains many customers who order different products. She requests the loan to buy raw materials needed for her business.

Translated from Spanish by Alba Sort , Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Elio

texts.es: El Sr. Elio es el hijo mayor, vive con su Papá y una Hemana en un departamento en calidad de anticrético , su Mamá se encuentra en España  por razones de trabajo desde hace 2 años; ayuda en la mantención de su casa. Elio es un joven trabajador y responsable  que apoya económicamente a  su hermana  para que ella pueda estudiar , trabaja como transportista  propietario en una línea de radio taxis  que se encuentra en  la zona de Irpavi, Elio necesita comprar una radio de comunicación  para que pueda generar mejores ingresos y por otro lado necesita hacer  algunos tramites de cambio de nombre de su movilidad razón por la cual  solicita este financiamiento kiva.
texts.en:
Elio, an eldest son, lives with his father and one of his sisters in a rented appartment. His mother, who has been in Spain for work reasons for the last 2 years, helps them with their home expenses. Elio is a young and responsible worker who is supporting his sister financially so that she can study. He owns a car and works as a driver for a taxi company in the Irpavi neighbourhood. Elio has requested the Kiva loan because he needs to buy a car radio to communicate with the company so as to increase his income. He also needs to do some paperwork in order to change the name that appears in the car documentation.

Translated from Spanish by Alba Sort , Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy car radio and pay for paperwork.

loans.name: Daysis Maria

texts.es:
La señora Daysis Maria es casada, habita en la comarca Caño Blanco jurisdiccion de Nueva Guinea desde hace 20 años junto a su familia compuesta por su marido Mario Adolfo y sus 4 hijos, (3 estudian educación primaria).  

Esta solicitando financiamiento de su 2do credito con el objetivo de comprar 8 terneros de 255 kilos, los cuales pretende engordarlos para cuando lleguen al peso deseado poder venderlos y obtener ganancias que le permitan brindarle a su familia mejores condiciones de vida. Daysis posee una pequeña finca la cual presenta buenas condiciones de pastos natural, pasto mejorado y aguaje de todo tiempo, le brinda buen manejo a su inventario, ademas recibe ingresos por venta de leche. Daysis se caracteriza por ser una mujer trabajadora, emprendedora le gusta ser dueña de su propia económia, su mayor sueño es poder brindarle a su familia las mejores condiciones y poder dejarle a sus hijos un patrimonio con el cual puedan trabajar.
texts.en:
Daysis Maria is married. She has lived in the Caño Blanco region, in the Nueva Guinea jurisdiction, for 20 years with her family: her husband, Mario Adolfo, and their 4 children (3 of whom are in elementary school). She is requesting financing for her second loan. Her goal is to purchase 8 255-kilo calves, which she will fatten up until they reach a desirable weight to sell and obtain an income to offer her family better living conditions. Daysis has a small farm that has good, natural pastures. They are improving all the time. She manages her inventory well, and she makes income from milk sales. Daysis is a hard-working and entrepreneurial woman who likes to be in charge of her own money. Her greatest dream is to be able to offer her family the best conditions and to be able to give her children an inheritance to work with.

Translated from Spanish by Christine Cooper, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: the purchase of calves

loans.name: Jose Daniel

texts.es:
Don José  Daniel,habita en la Comarca El Camastro, jurisdiccion de Nueva Guinea junto a su familia compuesta por su esposa la Sra. Maritza Padilla y sus hijos los cuales le apoyan con el trabajo de su pequeña finca de 55 Mzs la cual presenta buenas condiciones técnicas, donde también realiza manejo sanitario y nutricional, lo cual le ayuda al desarrollo del hato ganadero.  

Esta solicitando su 3er crédito con el objetivo de comprar de 6 terneros con un peso promedio de 255 kilo, los cuales cuidara y engordara hasta que obtengan el peso deseado para venderlos y obtener ganancias que le permitan mejorar las condiciones de su familia.  Ademas  recibe ingreso adicionales por la comercializacion de queso y productos de cultivos de granos basicos. José Daniel se caracteriza en su comunidad por ser  trabajador, responsable, con gran liderazgo en la comarca y por tener principios religiosos.
texts.en:
José Daniel lives in habita en El Camastr comarca, a jurisdiction New Guinea. He lives with his family made up of his wife, Mrs.Maritza Padilla, and their children who support him with the work on the small farm of 78.65 acres. His farm has good technical conditions. He manages sanitation and nutrition, which helps in the development of the cattle herd. He is asking for his third loan with the objective of buying 6 calves with an average weight of 255 kilos. He will car for them and fatten them up until they reach the desired weight for sale in order to make a profit and improve his family's lifestyle. He also receives additional income by selling cheese and basic grain crops. José Daniel is characterized in his community as being hard working and responsible with great leadership in the comarca, as well as having religios principles.

Translated from Spanish by Ellen Donohue, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy calves

loans.name: Placido

texts.es:
Placido de 34 años de edad vive en union libre con la Sra. Migdalia Burgo, en el Caserio La Tigra de la Comarca El Jicaro, jurisdiccion de Nueva Guinea.  

Esta solicitando su 1er crédito para la compra de dos vacas paridas, las cuales le permitiran obtener mayores ingresos por venta de leche, que es parte de su actividad agropecuaria.  Cuenta con su propia parcela de 45 mzs, las cuales presentan buenas condiciones para esta actividad agropecuaria, recibe ingresos adicionales por la venta de semovientes, en su comunidad es muy querido y se caracteriza por ser muy responsable.
texts.en:
Placido, age 34, lives with his common-law wife, Migdalia Burgo, in the La Tigra hamlet of the El Jicaro region, in the jurisdiction of Nueva Guinea. He is requesting his first loan for the purchase of two calving cows, which will allow him to obtain better income from milk sales, which is part of his agricultural activities. He has his own 45-manzana [78 acre] plot of land. His land is well-suited for this agricultural activity. He makes additional income from livestock sales. He is very beloved in his community and is known for being very responsible.

Translated from Spanish by Christine Cooper, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: the purchase of cows

loans.name: Angela Rosa

texts.es:
Doña Angela Rosa de 40 años de edad, vive en la comarca Villa Alvarez junto a su familia la cual le ha apoyado en el trabajo ganadero y agricola de su pequeña parcela la cual presenta buenas condiciones técnicas, en donde ademas realiza manejo sanitario y nutricional.  

Esta solicitando 1er crédito con el objetivo, realizar siembra de yuca lo cual le permitira incrementar los ingresos  y mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia. Recibe ingreso adicionales por la comercializacion de leche, granos basico y cultivos de raices y tuberculos. Su mayor sueño es poder continuar cultivando su finca y obtener ganancias para salir adelante con su familia.  Angela es una señora que se caracteriza por ser responsable y tener gran liderazgo en la comarca.
texts.en:
Angela Rosa, age 40, lives in the Villa Alvarez region with her family, who have supported her in her livestock and farm work on her small plot of land. Her land has good technical conditions, and she also manages health and nutrition. She is requesting her first loan with the goal of planting yucca, which will allow her to increase her income and improve her family's living conditions. She receives additional income from selling milk, basic grains, roots and tubers. Her greatest dream is to be able to continue cultivating on her farm and obtaining income to get her family ahead. Angela is a responsible woman and has a lot of leadership in her region.

Translated from Spanish by Christine Cooper, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: yucca planting

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es: Miguel Ángel G. y su esposa son una pareja muy joven y trabajadora; que desea levantar la barda de su vivienda para ofrecer a sus dos hijos mayor seguridad. Miguel comenta que la barda del patio de atrás de su casa esta muy baja lo cual teme que algún delincuente pueda pasar y causar algún daño.
texts.en:
Miguel Ángel G. and his wife are a very Young and hardworking couple. He wants to raise the wall outside of his home to be able to provide his children with more security. Miguel comments that the patio wall behind his house is very low, which is why he is afraid that a delinquent could get over it and cause damage.

Translated from Spanish by Kathleen O'Connell, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To raise the wall outside of his home

loans.name: José Santos

texts.es: El señor José Santos J. Marín es una persona muy trabajadora que percibe ingresos por medio de un transporte que lo maneja desde hace 2 años; llevando a niños a sus respectivas escuelas a su entrada y salida. A José le gustaría remodelar la barda de su vivienda pues la que tiene ya esta muy deteriorada lo cual necesita comprar material y pagar mano de obra, es por eso que pide de su apoyo para realizar su proyecto.
texts.en:
José Santos J. Marín is a very hardworking person who makes his living in transportation. He has been driving for the past 2 years, bringing children to their respective schools and picking them up later. José would like to remodel the wall of his home because the one that he currently has is damaged. To do this, he needs to purchase materials and pay for the labor. This is why he is requesting your help to complete his project.

Translated from Spanish by Kathleen O'Connell, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To remodel his wall

loans.name: Olga Guadalupe

texts.es: Olga Guadalupe D. L. N. es madre soltera D. tres hijos los cuales quiere ofrecerles una mejor calidad D. vida, pues ella se dedica a vender en la pulga como lo es la ropa usada, zapatos y bolsas a un bajo precio para así cubrir sus gastos. La vivienda que tiene la construyo con ahorros propios lo cual le hace falta el remodelar su baño.
texts.en:
Olga Guadalupe D. L. N. is a single mother of three children, for whom she wants to proviD. a better quality of life. She works at a flea market selling used clothing, shoes, and bags at a lower price to cover her expenses. She built the house where she lives with her own savings, but she still hasn’t remodeled her bathroom.

Translated from Spanish by Kathleen O'Connell, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To remodel her bathroom

loans.name: Roman

texts.es:
La persona que sale en la fotografía es la esposa.

Román M. P. es un hombre muy trabajador que es guardia de seguridad en una oficina de la ciudad. En este momento el requiere de un préstamo para arreglar el techo de su casa ya que con el tiempo se a deteriorado, lo cual necesita una reparación pues parte de el techo se cae cada que llueve y teme que esto se agrave lo cual no tenga remedio.
texts.en:
Román M. P. is a very hard-working man. He works as a security guard at an office in the city. At this time he is requesting a loan to fix the roof of his house since it has deteriorated over time. Every time it rains part of the roof falls in and he is afraid that it will get worse and there will be no way to fix it. The person that appears in the photo is his wife.

Translated from Spanish by Ann Achilli, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To repair his roof

loans.name: Ivan

texts.es: Iván  N. A. es un hombre muy responsable padre de dos pequeños por quienes trabaja para ofrecerle un mejor patrimonio, hace tiempo el adquirió su vivienda de interés social pero se ve en la necesidad de impermeabilizarla ya que  en temporada de lluvia se trasmina el agua lo cual no quiere que sus muebles se vayan a deteriorar y el gasto sea mas elevado.
texts.en:
Ivan N. Alegria is a very responsible father of 2 small children, and he works hard to build up family assets for them. Some time ago he acquired a publicly subsidized housing unit, but he needs to weatherproof it, since in the rainy season the water seeps through and he doesn't want his furniture to deteriorate, which would end up costing more.

Translated from Spanish by Lisa Grobar, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to weatherproof his home

loans.name: Martina

texts.es: Martina S. D. se dedica a vender artículos de catalogó que vende bajo pedido de acuerdo lo que el cliente necesite. Con este negocio ya lleva 2 años lo cuales le ha ido muy bien, ya que ofrece perfumes, cosméticos, artículos para el hogar y mas. La señora quiere un préstamo para invertir más en el negocio y así seguir generando más ingresos. Aunque Martina tiene su venta de productos, también trabaja en maquiladora.
texts.en:
Martina S. D. works as a catalog salesperson. She orders according to the needs of her customers. She has been doing this for 2 years now and things are going very well. She sells perfumes, cosmetics, household items and more. She is requesting a loan to invest in her business, and thereby increase her income. In addition to her catalog sales, she also works in an assembly plant.

Translated from Spanish by Ann Achilli, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase more merchandise to stock her business

loans.name: Amanda

texts.es: Amanda Pérez F.  esta preocupada por el bienestar de su hija pues el estado de salud es grave lo cual necesita una operación. La señora solicita un crédito para cubrir los gastos del hospital, pues prefiere que sea en particular para que sea mejor atendida. Amanda es muy trabajadora es maestra de belleza y de esta manera podría pagar su crédito.
texts.en:
Amanda Pérez F. is worried about her daughter’s well being because her health status is serious, for which she needs an operation. She is requesting a loan to cover the hospital expenses, as she prefers that it be done privately so that she is taken care of better. Amanda is very hardworking and is a beauty professional, which is how she will pay off her loan.

Translated from Spanish by Kathleen O'Connell, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Hospitalization expenses

loans.name: Elvira Guadalupe

texts.es: Elvira Guadalupe C. H. se dedica a la venta de donas y tamales que ella misma prepara desde hace 2 años, esta es de manera que ayuda con los gastos a su esposo que es pensionado. La señora requiere de un préstamo para seguir surtiendo su venta y así seguir generando mas ingresos a su familia.
texts.en:
Elvira Guadalupe C. H. makes a living selling donuts and tamales that she prepares herself and has been doing for the past 2 years. This is how she helps her husband, who is on pension, with the expenses. She needs a loan to continue supplying her sales and this way, generating more income for her family.

Translated from Spanish by Kathleen O'Connell, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase supplies for her business

loans.name: San Juana

texts.es: San Juana R. N. se dedica a la venta de gorditas de diferentes rellenos como lo son de frijoles, guisado, rajas con queso y mas, este negocio es llamado “Gorditas Hym” que ya lleva 1 año, es del cual le genera ingresos para cubrir sus gastos. La señora necesita de un crédito para comprar mercancía para el negocio.
texts.en:
San Juana R. N. works selling “gorditas” (a small thick tortilla made from corn flour) with different fillings such as beans, stew, peppers and cheese, and others. Her business is called “Gorditas Hym” and it has been in business for one year. This is how she makes money to cover her expenses. She needs a loan to purchase merchandise for her business.

Translated from Spanish by Kathleen O'Connell, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase merchandise

loans.name: Merlyn

texts.en: Merlyn M. is from the village of Dimaluna, Ozamis City. She is 32 years old and is married with two school-aged children. Merlyn owns and operates a sari-sari (variety) store, selling a variety of products to the local community. She has been engaged in this business for two years and earns approximately 2,000 PHP a month. In 2009, Merlyn joined PMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. She has successfully repaid a previous loan of 14,995 PHP from PMPC. Merlyn is requesting a new loan of 14,995 PHP which will be used to purchase additional products for her retail store. This will be her 4th loan from PMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family. About PMPC: Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC) is one of the most progressive cooperatives in northwestern Mindanao. It reaches out to the rural poor using the Grameen model. *Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva. Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase additional products to sell in her retail store

loans.name: Fe Retuya's Group

texts.en: Mrs. Fe R. is from Ozamis City. She is 47 years old and is married with two adult children. She is the group leader of this four-member group loan offered by PMPC. While each member receives an individual loan, they are all responsible for paying back the loans of their fellow group members if someone is delinquent or defaults. The official name of this borrowing group is Fe R.’s Group. Fe owns and operates a business making and selling food, selling snacks and other delicacies in the local community. She has been engaged in her business for twenty-five years and earns approximately 3,000 PHP a month. In 2006, Fe joined PMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. She has successfully repaid a previous loan of 14,900 PHP from PMPC. Fe is now requesting a new loan of 5,000 PHP which will be used to purchase additional products to sell. This loan will be her fifth from PMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family. About PMPC: Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC) is one of the most progressive cooperatives in northwestern Mindanao. It reaches out to the rural poor using the Grameen model. *Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva. Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase additional products to sell

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en:
Lydia M. is from Dipolog City. She is 55 years old. Lydia is married and has two adult children. To make a living, Lydia owns and operates a tailoring business. The main source of income for the business comes from providing general alteration and tailoring services to local community members. Lydia has been engaged in her business for over four years and earns approximately 6,000 PHP a month for these activities. In 2008, Lydia joined PMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Lydia has successfully repaid a previous loan of 5,000 PHP from PMPC. This previous loan was used to purchase additional fabrics and materials. Lydia is requesting a new loan of 5,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase additional inventory, and as working capital. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve and expand it. About PMPC:
Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC) is one of the most progressive cooperatives in northwestern Mindanao. It reaches out to the rural poor using the Grameen model.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva. Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase additional inventory and as working capital

loans.name: Tob

texts.en: Tob I., 27, is married and lives with her husband and two young children in the Kampong Chnang province. Since 1999, she has been raising pigs to earn a living and is able to make about US $2.50 per day, while her husband has a business recharging batteries. He typically makes US $5 of income a day. Tob I. is asking for a loan of US $1,000 to make a new investment for her husband. Tob I. wants to buy technician tools for hI.. Before, her husband was a technician, so this time she wants her husband to start this kind of business in order to gain more income to support the family.

loans.use: To buy technician tools

loans.name: Ker

texts.en: Ker P., 58, is a widow and lives with three children. She is a teacher at a state school and is able to make about US $2 a day. She is also supported by two of the children who are employed. Since her children spend a lot on transportation, Ker P. would like to take out a loan of US $800 to purchase a motorbike for her children to commute to work.

loans.use: To purchase a motorbike

loans.name: Zenaida

texts.en: Zenaida M. is a widow who lives in Purok 1, Barangay Cabacungan, La Castellana, Negros Occidental. She earns her living by operating three business ventures: dressmaking/tailoring, rice retailing, and selling ready-to-wear (RTW) clothes. Zenaida joined NWTF-Project Dungganon in 2007 because she wished for something better for her family. With the help of her past five loans from NWTF-Project Dungganon, she has been incrementally lifting her family out of poverty by the sweat of her brow. Her previous loan of PHP 13,000 helped her earn a monthly profit of PHP 5,500, thus uplifting her family's standard of living. This time, for her 6th loan, Zenaida is borrowing PHP 16,000, which she intends to use to buy more stock for her dressmaking, RTW and rice businesses so that she can continue to save for the future education of her children and for the expansion of her businesses. Zenaida is a Dungganon woman who is following an honorable path toward the achievement of her dreams. About NWTF: In a world full of challenges, Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation (NWTF), is making a difference in the lives of thousands of women through Project Dungganon (a Hiligaynon word that means Honorable). Through the alleviation program, NWTF is empowering these women to progress out of earning less than $1 a day to achieving realities that surpass even their dreams. They have taken a life path that will ultimately make them Dungganon - a title of esteem that is bestowed to a member of a community who has earned the respect through a lifetime of hard and honest work. Help NWTF continue in its mission to help the poorest in the Philippines by visiting the NWTF lending team on Kiva to join our team.

loans.use: To buy more stock for her dressmaking, RTW and rice businesses

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Chann Oun

texts.en: Mrs. Chann Oun K. is a 26-year-old villager in Mea Neak village, Takeo province. She and her husband, Mr. Rom Meas, are farmers who own a 2.80 hectare plot of land to cultivate rice to sell to support their family. Mr. Rom Meas is also a fisherman and a farming laborer. Mrs. Chann Oun K.'s problem is that it is time to grow rice but she does not have enough rice seed. To improve production, she is seeking a loan to buy rice seed. With the rest of the loan, she will buy fertilizer, pesticide and rent a plow for her field. She is the mother of two children who are too young to work or study. Mrs. Chann Oun K. is shown in the photo with her husband.

loans.use: To buy rice seed

loans.name: Say

texts.en:
Say S., 41, is married and lives with her four children in Kampong Chhnang province. She raises pigs and makes rice wine, making approximately US$5 each day. Her husband is a teacher and her family is also supported by her husband’s US$2 income each day.

Say S. is asking for a loan of US$500 to purchase a motorbike for her family’s transportation.

loans.use: To purchase a motorbike for her family’s transportation

loans.name: Heng

texts.en:
Heng C., 52, is married with five children and lives in Kampong Chhnang province. She operates a grocery store, typically making US$3 each day. Her husband, Um Bonara, runs a moto-taxi and typically makes about US$2 each day.

Heng C. would like a loan of US$1,000 to increase her stock of grocery products.

loans.use: To increase her stock of grocery products

loans.name: Mrs. Keat Naun Village Bank Group

texts.en: Thirteen people who live in Chroung Sdau village in Takeo province have selected Mrs. Keat N., born in 1957, to be a village bank president. They will each use their portion of the loan for different purposes to improve their families' standards of living. Mrs. Keat N. and her husband, Mr. Moav Plou, are farmers who own 1.5-hectare plot of land to cultivate rice to sell in order to support their family's costs of living. Mrs. Keat N. is a chicken breeder while her husband is a battery charger in the local village. Since her breeding chickens is going well, she wants to expand the business. So, to improve this business, Mrs. Keat N. is seeking for a loan to buy more chickens for breeding. She is mother of a child who is 22 years old.

loans.use: To buy more chickens for breeding.

loans.name: Sheila

texts.en: Sheila G. is from the village of Bantuanon, Lantapan, Bukidnon. She is 27 years old and is married with three school-aged children. Sheila owns and operates a sari-sari (variety) retail shop, selling both food and daily-use products in the local community. She has been engaged in her business for over three years and earns approximately 4,000 PHP a month. In 2010, Sheila joined HSPFI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. She is requesting a loan of 5,000 PHP which will be used to purchase additional products to sell. This loan will be her first from HSPFI. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve and expand her business.
